title: After fixes were automatically applied the compiler reported errors within the file.
body:
I tried this code: ```rust use tokio::pin; // tokio = { version = "0.2", features = ["full"] } use std::io; async fn my_async_fn() -> io::Result<()> { // async logic here Ok(()) } #[tokio::main] async fn main() { let future = my_async_fn(); pin!(future); // (&mut future).await; } ``` I expected to see this happen: *cargo fix* Instead, this happened: ```sh warning: failed to automatically apply fixes suggested by rustc to crate `test_cargo_fix` after fixes were automatically applied the compiler reported errors within these files: * src/main.rs This likely indicates a bug in either rustc or cargo itself, and we would appreciate a bug report! You're likely to see a number of compiler warnings after this message which cargo attempted to fix but failed. If you could open an issue at https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues quoting the full output of this command we'd be very appreciative! Note that you may be able to make some more progress in the near-term fixing code with the `--broken-code` flag The following errors were reported: error[E0425]: cannot find value `_future` in this scope --> src/main.rs:12:10 | 12 | pin!(_future); | ^^^^^^^ help: a local variable with a similar name exists: `future` error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0425`. Original diagnostics will follow. warning: unused variable: `future` --> src/main.rs:12:10 | 12 | pin!(future); | ^^^^^^ help: if this is intentional, prefix it with an underscore: `_future` | = note: `#[warn(unused_variables)]` on by default ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.53.0 (53cb7b09b 2021-06-17) binary: rustc commit-hash: 53cb7b09b00cbea8754ffb78e7e3cb521cb8af4b commit-date: 2021-06-17 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.53.0 LLVM version: 12.0.1 ```
Backtrace

```sh # RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo fix --broken-code error[E0425]: cannot find value `_future` in this scope --> src/main.rs:12:10 | 12 | pin!(_future); | ^^^^^^^ help: a local variable with a similar name exists: `future` error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0425`. error: could not compile `test_cargo_fix` To learn more, run the command again with --verbose. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error[E0425]: cannot find value `_future` in this scope --> src/main.rs:12:10 | 12 | pin!(_future); | ^^^^^^^ help: a local variable with a similar name exists: `future` error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0425`. error: build failed ```
